channel.title: All i want is
channel.description: A server client that either someone had edited or is already for quests. I cant seem to figure out how to add npcs and quests. IS there a place where i can download a complete source? ready to go?

item.title: All i want is
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

317 is a low-standard type of server…
508 is a much better grade of server that can host much more/handles more map areas such as Gwd, but usually doesn’t feature things 317’s do. Like having random NPCs stand in front of portals. Lol. Try searching 508? 508’s are sometimes run in HD, like the current Rs, and can feature fullscreen. 317’s are too undefined for such features. XD
508+ servers have Construction, Hunter, and Summoning skills, too. 472’s can make mirrors of the skills in worse ways, but get the idea out… There’s a lot of kinds of servers.
525 is the step up from 508, but Idk anything about those. ^^…

508 - [NOT ADVERTISING; getting a point out.] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=328607.0

Read full topic

mustbaj:

can you show me how? i could give you a real rs accoutn if you could help me with all this.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 18, 2009, 12:50:59 pm[/size][hr]o and can you join my server if you decide to help. right now im messing with allstarscape

Not sure how to add quests, npcs I’d need to mess about with for awhile to regain knowledge.
I’d join, but I’m making a temp. 317 while I figure out this 508 crap. ^^"

item.title: All i want is
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

If you want a GOOD server, you can’t ask for a complete source that people have edited. Nobody releases those. You have to work around a simple base people created and try coding for yourself.

Try allstarscapev2, deltascape, or some other popular base to begin with, and change some things up. (First and foremost, the startup messages to your server name. <Popular change, lol.)

Read full topic
